categories: Category:Imperial Navy officers of the Sith Empire

nodes.text: Joris was a male Human officer of the reconstituted Sith Empire living during the Galactic War. In 3640 BBY he was the Captain of Darth Achelon's flagship Carnage, which engaged the Republic fleet in battle. Joris contacted the nearby Harrower-class dreadnought Doombringer, which was used by Moff Valion Pyron to test the Silencer superlaser and requested aid.
Captain Joris appears in Star Wars: The Old Republic during the Sith Inquisitor class mission.
